entries.topic: VPN Structures (VPN 0 Transport, VPN 512 Management, Service VPNs)
Serial Number and Chassis ID Verification
Symmetric Encryption Keys and Rekey Timers
Plug and Play (PnP) for IOS XE
Explicit Redistribution (BGP, EIGRP, LISP, IS-IS, OSPF External)
SLA Class Scaling (up to 16 per device, 64 globally)
Layer 3/4 Header Matching (IP, Port, Protocol, DSCP)
Protocol Support (HTTP, SMTP, IMAP, POP3, FTP, SMB)
Supported DNS Record Types (A, AAAA, TXT)
